name: Unshaded
description:
The player plays as a saboteur with the callsign "Fiend". The Fiend is a specialist in silent penetration into enemy territory and the elimination of the most dangerous and wanted criminals. The Fiend prefers edged weapons. He has a large arsenal at his disposal: explosives, smoke bombs, mines, throwing knives and a faithful katana.
The player has to go through 100 difficult levels, at each level the player needs to complete several missions. You cannot go right through, the enemies are well armed, the best strategy would be to eliminate the enemies before they notice you, you need to stay away from light sources, hide in the shadows, and attack when the enemy is not expecting it.
Over time, the player will learn new skills that will make it easier to complete. The player can open costumes, costumes provide new opportunities for the player.
The player can choose a suit for himself and his style of play.

Story

3135 Corporations rule the world.
There is chaos on the streets of the country ... The police are corrupt - people die every day ... Many gangs are fighting for power in the territory. The streets are awash with the drug "Mist" and guns.
Agiru Corporation is hiring a former military man, call sign "Fiend", to test the new technology for expanse travel. At the same time, undermine the criminal actions of gangs, in a fight with their bosses.
